message: Christina Fernandes

(Sarcasm): Oh so glad to have a government to protect us from the menace of Vietnamese women bringing massive herds of seahorses into the country, we all know the many news reports of seahorses entering the country and mauling children, eating up our crops and terrorizing the masses, people running through the streets waiving their arms in the air and screaming while seahorses destroy buildings. Good to have faithful bureaucrats to protect us from the Seahorse scourge!

Bravo to these brave veterans for living by their oath to defend the constitution of the United States against all enemies, foreign and domestic. What the """"authorities"""" are doing against the Standing Rock protesters is criminal, and acting against our constitution by attacking peaceful protesters is treasonous.

Norma.. Show compassion? Miss Philippines went back there to console that loser ms colombia and what did the other pageants did to her? Not to mention them cheering """"miss colombia"""". Did u see any of the videos? Have you seen the pageant?They ignored, snarled at her, very disrespectful not to mention rude and those hispanic guys were telling those other losers to push her off the stage ( of course in spanish) What other compassion and kindness if she were you? I guess u understand wrong. All you know is """"hearsay"""". I watched the whole show and even if I'm Filipino, being objective, I was surprised when they announced the winner. It should have been Miss USA ist runner up not Miss Colombia. All she talk about is for the Latina community and she's very selfish. How could you be a Miss Universe if u only want to represent your own ethnicity .
Like like like like... good to know SOMEBODY'S listening!

I blame Mitt Romney for trying to use the deaths of 4 Americans for political purposes. He couldn't wait to jump in front of a camera and blame it on President Obama even before he knew that Ambassador Stevens was dead. Why wouldn't we think that the attack on Benghazi was because of a You Tube video? There were protests all over the world that day because of the video. Our Embassy in Cairo was attacked by protesters because of the video only a few hours earlier that day. Stop trying to exploit a tragedy.

I agree - I have donated twice now - both times to PANTENE. Lock of Love also charges their recipients (on an income guideline scale). Pantene works with several non profits to be able to provide wigs free of charge.
Why oh why do we announce these things for crying out loud!

you talk politics, I think what I said is very clear, common sense, and numbers that can be produced today in the biz and residential world. Those who don't see politics is the broken system that causes most of our problems aren't paying attention. For some reason, this country has evolved into folks begging for BS politics and """"policies"""" to save us. There is waste everywhere that will actually put cash in the pockets of nearly every biz and homeowner. And it doesn't take politics or """"clean air acts"""". It takes education, contractors to stop ripping people off, and politicians to deliver a simple message based on the govt energy star page, common sense, and REAL numbers.

Used the right way, spraying unlawful protesters and rioters with water is a great way to get them to disperse. If such things happen at night in just about any time of year, the protesters and rioters will go home because they are cold and wet. A trained individual can spray water in an arc similar to a rainbow. The water will fall like heavy rain and not injure anyone.
Betty, stop worshiping the earth. No such thing as Mother Earth. It is Father God.

A stomach bug has nothing to do with influenza, which is respiratory. Therefore, whether or not someone got a flu shot is irrelevant to this story.
